messages.message:
We're continuously retrying a jobs search
Example URL: https://aihub.instabase.com/workspaces/deploy/runs?workspace=Relai

Yeah this is unfortunately how searching over runs works - we don't have a way of searching by string over the job ids, so we are basically stuck doing the filtering in every page on the frontend. We should make a backend ticket for solution management for implementing substring search over job id.
